00049 class CIndexEntry :  public string
00050 {
00051 public:
00053         int left; 
00055         int right; 
00056 
00064 
00065         CIndexEntry(int left, int right, string str) : left(left), right(right), string(str)
00066         {
00067                 assert(right - left + 1 == length());
00068         }
00069 
00075         CIndexEntry& operator= (char *c)
00076         {
00077                 string::operator=(c);
00078                 return *this;
00079         }
00080 
00086         CIndexEntry& operator= (string &s)
00087         {
00088                 string::operator=(s);
00089                 return *this;
00090         }
00091 };
00092 
00093 std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream& out, const CIndexEntry& ix);

00136 #define TOBIT(c) c - '0' + 1
00137 #define MAP_FACE(f) (f >= '0' && f <'9'+3) ? f-'0' : f -'A'  + '9' + 3 + 1
